original_text: I thought about something else on the earth that has no purpose. I thought about something else on the earth that has no purpose. I thought about something else on the earth that has no purpose.
korean_text: 내가 또 다시 해 아래에서 헛된 것을 보았도다

sentences.original_text: I thought about something else on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 땅 위의 다른 것에 대해 생각했다
